titles.title: Advancing International and Foreign Language Education Act
Advancing International and Foreign Language Education Act
A bill to reauthorize title VI of the Higher Education Act of 1965 in order to improve and encourage innovation in international education, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Advancing International and Foreign Language Education Act
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise the international education programs at the Department of Education.
